Here we simulate stock prices then plot ACF

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

mu <- 0.02
sigma <- 0.05
initial = 100
mystock = numeric(100)
mystock[1] = initial
eshocks <- rnorm(100)
for (i in 2:100) {
  mystock[i] = mystock[i-1]*exp(mu + sigma*eshocks[i])
}
plot(mystock)

ss <- ts(mystock)

ss_returns <- log(mystock[-1]/mystock[-100])

ggAcf(ss_returns)
